logicalTable.name: Fact - CX - Subscriptions
tags: Project:Fusion Analytics Warehouse - Customer Experience Subscription Analytics

logicalColumns.name: # of Subscriptions

expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXS_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_CF.SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_ID

logicalColumns.name: # of Active Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code

logicalColumns.name: # of New Active Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.First Subscription Flag

logicalColumns.name: # of Active Subscriptions Added - Last 30 days

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL( FILTER(%1 USING %2 = 'ORA_ACTIVE' AND  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %3,  CURRENT_DATE ) BETWEEN 0 AND 30), 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Start Date

logicalColumns.name: # of Expired Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code

logicalColumns.name: # of Subscriptions Expired - Last 30 days

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL( FILTER(%1 USING %2 = 'ORA_EXPIRED' AND  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY , %3,  CURRENT_DATE ) BETWEEN 0 AND 30), 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription End Date

logicalColumns.name: # of Active Subscriptions Expiring - Next 30 days

logicalExpression.expressionTemplate: IFNULL( FILTER(%1 USING  NOT %2 IN ('ORA_DRAFT', 'ORA_CANCELED') AND  TIMESTAMPDIFF( SQL_TSI_DAY ,  CURRENT_DATE , %3) BETWEEN 0 AND 30), 0)
expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription End Date

logicalColumns.name: # of Renewed Active Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Renewal Subscription Flag

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Renewal Subscription Flag

logicalColumns.name: # of Terminated Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Date - Subscription Amend Effective Date Gregorian Calendar.Subscription Amend Effective Day Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Date - Subscription Suspended Date Gregorian Calendar.Subscription Suspended Day Code

logicalColumns.name: # of Evergreen Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Evergreen Subscription Flag

logicalColumns.name: # of Expansion Active Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Subscription MRR Expansion Flag

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Subscription MRR Expansion Flag

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Subscription Amend Reason Code

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Subscriptions

expressionObjects: logicalColumn:Core.Fact - CX - Subscriptions.# of Customers
logicalColumn:Core.Dim - CX - Subscription.Internal - Subscription Status Code

logicalColumns.name: # of Products

physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CAST (%1 AS CHARACTER ( 30 )) || '~' ||  CAST (%2 AS CHARACTER ( 30 ))
expressionObjects: physicalColumn:Oracle_Data_Warehouse.OAX$OAC.Fact_DW_CXS_SUBSCRIPTION_PRODUCT_CF.INVENTORY_ITEM_ID
